title: Altria Group Reports Earnings on Thursday. Here’s What to Expect.
text:
Altria Group stock has struggled in 2019, as investors worry about its stake in vaping firm Juul Labs, amid reports of potential health problems linked to e-cigarette use. Investors are hoping for some good news in the tobacco giant’s third-quarter earnings report, due on Thursday.

Altria shares (ticker: MO) are down more than 6% this year, trailing the S&P 500’s more than 20% rise. Here is a snapshot of Wall Street’s expectations for the earnings, due before the market opens, and some recent history.

...
description: Analysts are looking for Altria to earn $1.15 a share on revenue of $5.35 billion. That compares with $1.10 a share and revenue of $5.19 billion in the previous quarter.
